data.eml:eml: New species and records of Anacroneuria (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from the northeastern semi-arid region of Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Duarte, Tácio, Lecci, Lucas Silveira (2016): New species and records of Anacroneuria (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from the northeastern semi-arid region of Brazil. Zootaxa 4079 (2), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4079.2.10
